name: PagerDuty
natural_language_description: 这是 PagerDuty 节点。主要用于: Consume PagerDuty API

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 默认值: apiToken
available_options: API Token (值: apiToken)
OAuth2 (值: oAuth2)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: incident
available_options: Incident (值: incident)
Incident Note (值: incidentNote)
Log Entry (值: logEntry)
User (值: user)
Custom API Call (值: __CUSTOM_API_CALL__)

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: get
available_options: Get (值: get) - Get a user
Custom API Call (值: __CUSTOM_API_CALL__)

title.name: title
title.description: A succinct description of the nature, symptoms, cause, or effect of the incident
title.natural_language_description: 参数名: Title | 作用: A succinct description of the nature, symptoms, cause, or effect of the incident | (必填项)

serviceId.name: serviceId
serviceId.description: The incident will be created on this service. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
serviceId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Service Name or ID | 作用: The incident will be created on this service. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

email.name: email
email.description: The email address of a valid user associated with the account making the request
email.natural_language_description: 参数名: Email | 作用: The email address of a valid user associated with the account making the request | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: escalationPolicyId (值: None) - Delegate this incident to the specified escalation policy. Cannot be specified if an assignee is given. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
details (值: None) - Additional details about the incident which will go in the body

incidentKey (值: None) - Sending subsequent requests referencing the same service and with the same incident_key will result in those requests being rejected if an open incident matches that incident_key
priorityId (值: None) - The incident will be created on this service. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
urgency (值: None) - The urgency of the incident

conferenceBridgeUi.name: conferenceBridgeUi
conferenceBridgeUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Conference Bridge | 默认值: {}
available_options: conferenceBridgeValues (值: None)

incidentId.name: incidentId
incidentId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Incident ID | 作用: Unique identifier for the incident | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 100

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: include (值: None) - Additional details to include
isOverview (值: None) - Whether to return a subset of log entries that show only the most important changes to the incident
since (值: None) - The start of the date range over which you want to search. (the limit on date ranges is 6 months).
timeZone (值: None) - Time zone in which dates in the result will be rendered. If not set dates will return UTC. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
until (值: None) - The end of the date range over which you want to search. (the limit on date ranges is 6 months).

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: escalationLevel (值: None) - Escalate the incident to this level in the escalation policy
escalationPolicyId (值: None) - Delegate this incident to the specified escalation policy. Cannot be specified if an assignee is given. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
priorityId (值: None) - The incident will be created on this service. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
resolution (值: None) - The resolution for this incident if status is set to resolved
status (值: None) - The new status of the incident
title (值: None) - A succinct description of the nature, symptoms, cause, or effect of the incident
urgency (值: None) - The urgency of the incident

content.name: content
content.natural_language_description: 参数名: Content | 作用: The note content | (必填项)

logEntryId.name: logEntryId
logEntryId.description: Unique identifier for the log entry
logEntryId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Log Entry ID | 作用: Unique identifier for the log entry | (必填项)

userId.name: userId
userId.natural_language_description: 参数名: User ID | 作用: Unique identifier for the user | (必填项)
